* '''Location''': Maryland
* '''Project Completion Date''': TBD
* '''Project Coordinator''': Nate (Omegamormegil)

=== Summary ===

We will be taking donations of computers, getting them running with a Linux OS, and donating them to people that need them, particularly children.  

Inspired by similar projects such as:

* <nowiki>[[http://linuxagainstpoverty.org/]]</nowiki>
* <nowiki>[[http://www.heliosinitiative.org/]]</nowiki>

=== Volunteers ===

We will need people to help with:

* Obtaining computers 
* Storing donations 
* Helping with refurbing/installation 
* Finding people that need them 
* Distribution  

Feel free to add to this list of contributions. 

If you are interested in helping out, please add your name to this list along with your email address and how you'd like to help.  Once we get rolling, we will contact those interested when we need help.
